post:
Hello, Members Of LowEndTalk,  

Stack Network Ltd, founded in 2015, is a fast-growing company specialized in Web Hosting and Website Development & Designing, at this moment we have served over 3K customers throughout the world.   

Stack Network Ltd provides Web Hosting solutions from Cloud Servers to Dedicated Servers, it now has 6 pops located in different continents which are: Los Angeles (US West Coast), New York City (US East), Mainland China, Hong Kong (China), Seoul (Korea) and Düsseldorf (Germany).  

We have our own in-house Level I to Level III technicians, developers and designers, most of whom have over 6-year experience in Web Hosting industry and websites development. We are able to provide 24x7x365 customer service via Live Chat, email and support tickets system, in most of the time, you are supposed to get a response in minutes!  

Our company details here: [https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/09875794](https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/09875794)  

Today we want to announce another promotional offer on LET. We are offering  

**35% recurring discount in all of your budget VPS Plans (Linux Only)**  
**50% recurring discount in our Premium Starter Plan (Linux & Windows)**  

Use: **LETBUDGETSPECIAL** as coupon code for budget plans, coupon valid till 17th October.  
Use: **LEBSEPSALE** as coupon code for premium plan, coupon valid till the stock lasts.    

**Plan 1 - Budget-512M**    

1 vCPU Core  
512MB RAM  
20GB HDD   
500GB Monthly Transfer @ 1Gbps  
1 IPV4 Address Included  
Normal Price: $2.9 USD Monthly  
Discounted Price: $1.88 USD Monthly   
Order Here: [https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=1](https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)   
  
**Plan 2 - Budget-1GB**  

1 vCPU Core  
1GB RAM    
30GB HDD  
1000GB Monthly Transfer @ 1Gbps  
1 IPV4 Address Included

Discounted Price: $3.8 USD Monthly  
Order Here: [https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=2](https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)  

**Plan 3 - Budget-2G**  

2 vCPU Cores  
2GB RAM

Monthly Discounted Price: $5.13 USD Monthly  
Order Here: [https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=23](https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=23)  


**Premium Plan 1GB (KVM)**  

1 CPU Cores  
1GB Guaranteed RAM  
30GB Disk Space  
1000GB Monthly Transfer @ 1Gbps  
1 IPV4 Address Included  
Normal Price: $9.9 USD Monthly  
Discounted Price: $4.95 USD Monthly  
Order Here: [https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=35](https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=35)  

**Addons:**  

Additional IPV4：$1/month each  
Additional 1 GB RAM: $3/month  
Additional 500GB Bandwidth: $5/month  
DirectAdmin License: $10/month (We can install it for you for free!)  
cPanel License: $14.95/month (We can install it for you for free!)  

**Payment Methods:** Paypal, Alipay and Credit/Debit Cards.  
 
If you have questions contact us via  
Email: sales@thestack.net  
Skype: StackNetwork  
Or Live Chat.  

**Datacenter Info:** We are using Psychz Los Angeles & IOFlood Phoenix network, you are welcome to test the network using information below:  

Test IPV4: 199.231.84.66 (IOFlood Phoenix)  
Test IPV4: 45.34.158.226 (Psychz Los Angeles)  

Thanks and have a good day.
